mean_en: having or showing hatred and a desire to harm somebody or hurt their feelings; (of software or computer code) intended to damage somebody\u0027s computer or data files
sentence: He took malicious pleasure in watching him being tortured.
sentence_trans: 他怀着恶意的愉悦看着他被折磨。
word_etyma: malic诽谤 + ious有……的 → malicious恶意的
